name: Marvel Heroes and Villains - Real Names Quiz | Entertainment | 10 Questions

questions.text: What is the real name of Arclight?
questions.explanation:
Phillipa Sontag.

	Arclight is a member of the Marauders. Arclight sends shockwaves through anything she hits. She usually uses her power to throw foes off balance or to smash things.

questions.text: What is the real name of Banshee ?
questions.explanation:
Sean Cassidy.

	Sean Cassidy is now the headmaster of Generation X. Banshee has excellent control of a sonic scream. It allows him to fly, and he can use it to pulverize stone or knock people unconscious. He can even use his voice as a type of sonar.

questions.text: What is the real name of the Blob?
questions.explanation:
Fred J. Dukes

	The Blob was a member of the Brotherhood of Evil Mutants as well as Freedom Force. The Blob can increase his body's density until he is virtually immovable.

questions.text: What is the real name of the Beast ?
questions.explanation:
Henry McCoy.

	Henry McCoy is a member of the X-Men and also an Avenger. Beast was born with oversized hands and feet, remarkable agility and superhuman strength.

questions.text: What is the real name of Captain America ?
questions.explanation:
Steve Rogers.

	Captain America is basically a normal human, except that the Super-Soldier serum he was injected with in WWII has made him reach the ultimate potential of the human body. He is faster, stronger and smarter than the average person, but not superhumanly so. Cap carries a shield made from an adamantium-vibranium alloy that is virtually unbreakeable. Besides functioning as a shield, it can be thrown as a discus.

questions.text: What is the real name of Captain Britain?
questions.explanation:
Brian Braddock.

	Captain Britain was an original member of Excalibur. Captain Britain has super speed, strength, and stamina, flight and in his last appearances, a suit with a manipulable energy field. Brian is both a mutant and the son of another hero: his father was originally from Merlin's Otherworld. It's unclear which of Brian's powers are his own and which are his father's legacy.

questions.text: What is the real name of Cypher?
questions.explanation:
Doug Ramsey.

	Doug Ramsey was a member of the New Mutants. Cypher's ability was an innate understanding of all languages, human, computer or alien. He was a software genius as well. However, his lack of a physical power made combat dangerous for him, except when he was combined with his friend Warlock. He died saving the life of his teammate Wolfsbane.

questions.text: What is the real name of Firestar ?
questions.explanation:
Angelica Jones.

	Firestar used to be a member of the Hellions but is now an Avenger. Firestar generates microwave blasts. She also uses her power to fly.

questions.text: What is the real name of Gambit ?
questions.explanation:
Remy LeBeau.

	Remy is a member of the Thieves' Guild as well as an X-Men. Gambit can charge objects with kinetic energy, causing them to explode. He is extremely agile and quick, and well trained in the martial arts. His thoughts are hard to control, and his voice is somewhat hypnotic. As the adopted son of the leader of the Thieves' Guild of New Orleans, Gambit is also, needless to say, a phenomenal thief.

questions.text: What is the real name of Guardian ?
questions.explanation:
James MacDonald Hudson.

	James is the leader of Alpha Flight...Canada's super-hero team. Hudson wears a special battle-suit that allows him to fly, fire energy bolts, and manipulate the E-M spectrum, while affording him super-strength and near invulnerability.
